001package Ch11_CirclesAndEllipses;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004
005import ij.IJ;
006import ij.ImagePlus;
007import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
008import ij.gui.NewImage;
009import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
010import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.utils.CircleSampler;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
017
018
019/**
020 * ImageJ plugin, randomly samples an ideal circle and performs
021 * circle fitting on the (noisy) sample points.
022 * TODO: needs revision!
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 *
026 */
027public class Circle_Fit_Algebraic implements PlugIn {
028
029        public static int W = 400;
030        public static int H = 400;
031        
032        public static int N = 100;
033        public static double XC = 200;
034        public static double YC = 190;
035        public static double R = 150;
036        public static double Angle0 = 0;
037        public static double Angle1 = 45; // was Math.PI/4;
038        public static double SigmaNoise = 5.0; //2.0;
039        
040        public static final double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
041        public static double DashLength = 6;
042        public static double NoDash = 0;
043        public static double CenterMarkRadius = 3;
044        
045        public static final Color PointColor = Color.blue;
046        public static double PointRadius = 2;
047        
048        public static final Color RealCurveColor =              new Color(0,176,80);
049        public static final Color AlgebraicFitColor =   new Color(255,0,0);
050        public static final Color GeometricFitColor =   new Color(0,112,192);
051        public static final Color IntermediateFitColor = new Color(150,150,150);
052        public static final Color StartColor =                  new Color(255,192,0);
053        
054        static boolean DrawPoints = true;
055        static boolean DrawRealCircle = true;
056        static boolean DrawFitCircle = true;
057        
058        static CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType algType = FitType.Pratt;
059
060        @Override
061        public void run(String arg) {
062                
063                if (!runDialog()) {
064                        return;
065                }
066                
067                IJ.log("Algebraic fit type = " + algType);              
068                String title = this.getClass().getSimpleName() + "-" + algType;
069                
070                GeometricCircle realCircle = new GeometricCircle(XC, YC, R);
071                IJ.log(" real: " + realCircle.toString());
072                
073                Pnt2d[] points = new CircleSampler(realCircle).getPoints(N, Angle0, Angle1, SigmaNoise);
074                
075                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
076                CircleFitAlgebraic fitter = CircleFitAlgebraic.getFit(algType, points);
077                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
078                
079                GeometricCircle fitCircle = fitter.getGeometricCircle();
080                if (fitCircle == null) {
081                        IJ.log("Algebraic fit: no result!");
082                        return;
083                }
084                
085//              IJ.log("  fit: " + fitCircle);
086//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error real = %.3f", realCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
087//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error fit  = %.3f", fitCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
088
089                ImagePlus im = NewImage.createByteImage(title, W, H, 1, NewImage.FILL_WHITE);
090                
091                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
092                
093                // ----- draw sample points ----------------------------------
094                if (DrawPoints) {
095                        ColoredStroke pointStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, PointColor, 0);
096                        pointStroke.setFillColor(PointColor);
097                        for (Pnt2d p : points) {
098                                //ola.addShape(makePointShape(p, PointRadius), pointStroke);
099                                ola.addShape(p.getShape(PointRadius), pointStroke);
100                        }
101                }
102                // ----- draw real circle ----------------------------------
103                if (DrawRealCircle) {
104                        ColoredStroke outerStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, RealCurveColor, 0);
105                        ola.addShapes(realCircle.getShapes(), outerStroke);
106                }
107                // ----- draw fitted circle ----------------------------------
108                if (DrawFitCircle) {    
109                        ColoredStroke outerStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, AlgebraicFitColor, DashLength);
110                        ola.addShapes(fitCircle.getShapes(), outerStroke);              
111                }
112                
113                im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
114                im.show();
115        }
116        
117        // ------------------------------------------
118        
119        private boolean runDialog() {
120                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
121                
122                gd.addEnumChoice("fit method", algType);
123                gd.addCheckbox("DrawPoints", DrawPoints);
124                gd.addCheckbox("DrawRealCircle", DrawRealCircle);
125                gd.addCheckbox("DrawFitCircle", DrawFitCircle);
126                
127                gd.showDialog();
128                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
129                        return false;
130                }
131                
132                algType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType.class);
133                DrawPoints = gd.getNextBoolean();
134                DrawRealCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
135                DrawFitCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
136
137                return true;
138        }
139
140}
